âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Obtains detailed system and hardware information (SMBIOS, CPUID, S.M.A.R.T., PCI, EDID) â€¢ Supports exporting data in JSON, YAML, and LUA formats â€¢ Gathers information directly without relying on WMI â€¢ Compatible with Windows XP
ðŸ“– Summary: NWinfo is a Win32 program designed to retrieve comprehensive system and hardware details. It gathers information directly, bypassing WMI, and supports various export formats like JSON, YAML, and LUA. The tool is compatible with older Windows versions, including Windows XP.
